meanings.definition: In a highly skilled or knowledgeable manner.
meanings.sent1: She played the piano expertly during the recital.
meanings.sent2: He fixed the car expertly, making it run smoothly again.
meanings.sent3: The cat expertly caught the toy mouse, showing off its hunting skills.
meanings.sent4: The detective expertly unraveled the mystery, revealing the culprit.
meanings.sent5: The chef expertly seasoned the dish, creating a burst of flavors.

meanings.definition: Done with great skill or expertise.
meanings.sent1: The expertly crafted sculpture impressed everyone at the art show.
meanings.sent2: She wore an expertly tailored suit to the important meeting.
meanings.sent3: The expertly decorated cake looked too beautiful to eat.
meanings.sent4: The expertly designed building stood out among the rest of the city skyline.
meanings.sent5: The expertly written novel captured the hearts of readers worldwide.
